SEARCH
Modul htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer
Package htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer.controller

Klasse Controller

java.lang.Object
htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer.controller.Controller
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
GameController, LeaderboardController, MenuController, UsernameMenuController
public class Controller extends Object
The base controller class that provides common functionality for other controllers in the Minesweeper application.

This class includes utility methods for managing scenes, stages, text elements, and audio playback.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Controller

      public Controller()
      Default constructor for the Controller class.

      This constructor is required for JavaFX controllers, as they are often instantiated by the JavaFX runtime. It does not perform any specific initialization but ensures that an explicit constructor is present for documentation purposes.

  • Methodendetails

    • checkIfInputStreamIsNotNull

      public static void checkIfInputStreamIsNotNull(InputStream inputStream, String fileName) throws FileNotFoundException
      Validates that the provided InputStream is not null.

      This method checks if the given InputStream is null and throws a FileNotFoundException if the file cannot be found or loaded.

      Parameter:
      inputStream - The InputStream to validate.
      fileName - The name of the file associated with the InputStream (used in the exception message).
      Löst aus:
      FileNotFoundException - if the InputStream is null, indicating that the file could not be found.
